column5: Just seeing of there is any life on the red river or traverse Bay. Is there any big greenbacks coming out of this dirty fast water? Just wondering if anythig is being caught.

Been out to Pine Falls/Traverse Bay last two weekends. Nothing exciting happening, check out my responses in the "What's happen'n on the red R/Traverse Bay" posting a little further down in this Canada bulletin board. If your driving more than 1.5 hours to get here....might be considered to be a waste of gas. Would wait till some of the locals start reporting some action. Water is high and current is fast! Big mamas no where to be found. gms
